paper_abstract: Discrete vanishing moments and sum rules are established on the Heisenberg group and the relationship between them is investigated in this paper. Also, the compactly supported wavelets with 2 vanishing moments corresponding to the separable filter {a(m,n) h(l)} on the Heisenberg group are constructed by using the theory of discrete vanishing moments and sum rules.
paper_title: WAVELETS WITH VANISHING MOMENTS ON THE HEISENBERG GROUP
